attributes.action: Promote a UK Space Port in the north east of Scotland ,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This area is one of the favorite sites for  a Space Port identified by the Virgin company space exploitation branch ,Virgin Galactic. The 'Flight Path' is over one of the least populated parts of Europe and the North Sea, but has a skilled pool of workers at hand ,as well as transport connections to the rest of the UK and Europe.
